May 2017 – October 2017: Thorness Bay Holiday Park
Cleaner

Duties

Changing bed linen and making beds.
Cleaning bathrooms.
Cleaning windows and floors.
Cleaning ovens and washing dishes.

Deal with customers waiting to enter there holiday homes.
Responsibility for the security of up to 10 holiday homes a day.
